thread.title: Members of Congress: Don't bet against the Mets
thread.title_full: Members of Congress: Don't bet against the Mets

title: Members of Congress: Don't bet against the Mets
text:
Members Of Congress: Don't Bet Against The Mets Matt Picht 8:33 PM, Oct 23, 2015 
Photo Credit: C-SPAN 
"Mr. Speaker, I rise today to congratulate Congressman Steve Israel and his beloved New York Mets," Rep. Adam Schiff said . 
This is Adam Schiff. He's a Democratic representative from California, and a Dodgers fan. 
And he just lost a bet to this guy, Rep. Steve Israel (D-NY) , a fan of the New York Mets. 
The Mets beat the Dodgers 3-2 in their NCLS playoff series. 
The Mets went on to sweep the Cubs and secure a spot in the World Series. The Dodgers can try again next year. 
Yesterday, Schiff took part in the Benghazi Committee's 11-hour hearing of Hillary Clinton. 
Today, he's singing the New York Mets' fight song. 
This video includes images from Getty Images.
